primaryPerks.name: Grasp of the Undying
primaryPerks.description:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

primaryPerks.name: Aftershock
primaryPerks.description:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)
primaryPerks.shortDescription: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.

primaryPerks.name: Guardian
primaryPerks.description:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.

primaryPerks.name: Demolish
primaryPerks.description:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 3s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 100 (+35% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.

primaryPerks.name: Font of Life
primaryPerks.description:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.

primaryPerks.name: Shield Bash
primaryPerks.description:
While shielded, gain 1 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.

Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+1.5% Bonus Health) (+8.5% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.

primaryPerks.name: Conditioning
primaryPerks.description: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

primaryPerks.name: Second Wind
primaryPerks.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +6 over 10s.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.

primaryPerks.name: Bone Plating
primaryPerks.description:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s
primaryPerks.shortDescription:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s

primaryPerks.name: Overgrowth
primaryPerks.description:
Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.

When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

primaryPerks.name: Revitalize
primaryPerks.description:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
primaryPerks.shortDescription:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

primaryPerks.name: Unflinching
primaryPerks.description: Gain 10% Tenacity and 10% Slow Resist. These values increase by up to an additional 20% Tenacity and 20% Slow Resist based on missing health. Maximum value achieved at 30% health.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain a small amount of tenacity that increases with missing health.

subPerks.name: Overheal
subPerks.description:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.
subPerks.shortDescription: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.

subPerks.name: Triumph
subPerks.description:
Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner
subPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.

subPerks.name: Presence of Mind
subPerks.description:
Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.
subPerks.shortDescription: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.

subPerks.name: Legend: Alacrity
subPerks.description:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.

subPerks.name: Legend: Tenacity
subPerks.description:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 2.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.

subPerks.name: Legend: Bloodline
subPerks.description:
Gain 0.6% lifesteal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.

subPerks.name: Coup de Grace
subPerks.description: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

subPerks.name: Cut Down
subPerks.description:
Deal 5% to 15% more damage to champions, based on how much more max health they have than you.

Bonus damage scales up linearly against enemies with 10% to 100% more max health than you.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.

subPerks.name: Last Stand
subPerks.description: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.

primaryPerks.name: Electrocute
primaryPerks.description:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

primaryPerks.name: Predator
primaryPerks.description:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Movement Speed, ramping up to 45% Movement Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 40-120 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.1 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 90s-60s.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

primaryPerks.name: Dark Harvest
primaryPerks.description:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.

primaryPerks.name: Hail of Blades
primaryPerks.description:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 8s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.

primaryPerks.name: Cheap Shot
primaryPerks.description:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

primaryPerks.name: Taste of Blood
primaryPerks.description:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 18-35 (+0.2 bonus AD, +0.1 AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: 20s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

primaryPerks.name: Sudden Impact
primaryPerks.description:
After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 7 Lethality and 6 Magic Penetration for 5s.

Cooldown: 4s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.

primaryPerks.name: Zombie Ward
primaryPerks.description:
Takedowns on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Zombie Ward spawned, up to 10.

After spawning 10 Zombie Wards, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 120s and do not count towards your ward limit.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.

primaryPerks.name: Ghost Poro
primaryPerks.description:
When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro, which grants vision for 60s. Nearby enemy champions scare the Ghost Poro away.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Ghost Poro spawned and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion up to 10 stacks.

After gaining 10 stacks, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.

primaryPerks.name: Eyeball Collection
primaryPerks.description:
Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at 10 eyeballs, additionally gain an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.

Collect 1 eyeball per champion takedown.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.

primaryPerks.name: Ravenous Hunter
primaryPerks.description:
Omnivamp: 1% + 1.7% per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Omnivamp.

primaryPerks.name: Ingenious Hunter
primaryPerks.description:
Gain 10 Item Haste plus an additional 5 Item Haste per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Item Haste affects all items with cooldowns.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Item Haste (includes Trinkets).

primaryPerks.name: Relentless Hunter
primaryPerks.description:
Gain 5 Move Speed out of combat plus 8 per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.

primaryPerks.name: Ultimate Hunter
primaryPerks.description:
Your ultimate gains 6 Ability Haste, plus an additional 5 Ability Haste per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.

subPerks.name: Nullifying Orb
subPerks.description:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s
subPerks.shortDescription: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.

subPerks.name: Manaflow Band
subPerks.description:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds
subPerks.shortDescription:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

subPerks.name: Nimbus Cloak
subPerks.description:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 35% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).
subPerks.shortDescription: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.

subPerks.name: Transcendence
subPerks.description:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
subPerks.shortDescription:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

subPerks.name: Celerity
subPerks.description: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
subPerks.shortDescription: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

subPerks.name: Absolute Focus
subPerks.description:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.
subPerks.shortDescription: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

subPerks.name: Scorch
subPerks.description:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 15 - 35 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s
subPerks.shortDescription: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.

subPerks.name: Waterwalking
subPerks.description:
Gain 25 Move Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.
subPerks.shortDescription: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.

subPerks.name: Gathering Storm
subPerks.description:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...
subPerks.shortDescription: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.

primaryPerks.name: Electrocute
primaryPerks.description:

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

primaryPerks.shortDescription: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

primaryPerks.name: Aftershock
primaryPerks.description:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)
primaryPerks.shortDescription: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.

primaryPerks.name: Guardian
primaryPerks.description:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.

primaryPerks.name: Demolish
primaryPerks.description:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 3s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 100 (+35% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.

primaryPerks.name: Font of Life
primaryPerks.description:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.

primaryPerks.name: Shield Bash
primaryPerks.description:
While shielded, gain 1 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.

Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+1.5% Bonus Health) (+8.5% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.

primaryPerks.name: Conditioning
primaryPerks.description: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

primaryPerks.name: Second Wind
primaryPerks.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +6 over 10s.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.

primaryPerks.name: Bone Plating
primaryPerks.description:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s
primaryPerks.shortDescription:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s

primaryPerks.name: Overgrowth
primaryPerks.description:
Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.

When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

primaryPerks.name: Revitalize
primaryPerks.description:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
primaryPerks.shortDescription:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

primaryPerks.name: Unflinching
primaryPerks.description: Gain 10% Tenacity and 10% Slow Resist. These values increase by up to an additional 20% Tenacity and 20% Slow Resist based on missing health. Maximum value achieved at 30% health.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain a small amount of tenacity that increases with missing health.

subPerks.name: Cheap Shot
subPerks.description:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

subPerks.name: Taste of Blood
subPerks.description:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 18-35 (+0.2 bonus AD, +0.1 AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: 20s
subPerks.shortDescription: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

subPerks.name: Sudden Impact
subPerks.description:
After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 7 Lethality and 6 Magic Penetration for 5s.

Cooldown: 4s
subPerks.shortDescription: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.

subPerks.name: Zombie Ward
subPerks.description:
Takedowns on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Zombie Ward spawned, up to 10.

After spawning 10 Zombie Wards, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 120s and do not count towards your ward limit.
subPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.

subPerks.name: Ghost Poro
subPerks.description:
When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro, which grants vision for 60s. Nearby enemy champions scare the Ghost Poro away.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Ghost Poro spawned and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion up to 10 stacks.

After gaining 10 stacks, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.
subPerks.shortDescription: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.

subPerks.name: Eyeball Collection
subPerks.description:
Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at 10 eyeballs, additionally gain an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.

Collect 1 eyeball per champion takedown.
subPerks.shortDescription: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.

subPerks.name: Ravenous Hunter
subPerks.description:
Omnivamp: 1% + 1.7% per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.
subPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Omnivamp.

subPerks.name: Ingenious Hunter
subPerks.description:
Gain 10 Item Haste plus an additional 5 Item Haste per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Item Haste affects all items with cooldowns.
subPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Item Haste (includes Trinkets).

subPerks.name: Relentless Hunter
subPerks.description:
Gain 5 Move Speed out of combat plus 8 per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
subPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.

subPerks.name: Ultimate Hunter
subPerks.description:
Your ultimate gains 6 Ability Haste, plus an additional 5 Ability Haste per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
subPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.

primaryPerks.name: Electrocute
primaryPerks.description:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

primaryPerks.name: Predator
primaryPerks.description:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Movement Speed, ramping up to 45% Movement Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 40-120 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.1 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 90s-60s.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

primaryPerks.name: Dark Harvest
primaryPerks.description:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.

primaryPerks.name: Hail of Blades
primaryPerks.description:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 8s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.

primaryPerks.name: Cheap Shot
primaryPerks.description:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

primaryPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.

subPerks.name: Overheal
subPerks.description:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.
subPerks.shortDescription: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.

subPerks.name: Triumph
subPerks.description:
Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner
subPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.

subPerks.name: Presence of Mind
subPerks.description:
Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.
subPerks.shortDescription: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.

subPerks.name: Legend: Alacrity
subPerks.description:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.

subPerks.name: Legend: Tenacity
subPerks.description:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 2.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.

subPerks.name: Legend: Bloodline
subPerks.description:
Gain 0.6% lifesteal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.

subPerks.name: Coup de Grace
subPerks.description: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

subPerks.name: Cut Down
subPerks.description:
Deal 5% to 15% more damage to champions, based on how much more max health they have than you.

Bonus damage scales up linearly against enemies with 10% to 100% more max health than you.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.

subPerks.name: Last Stand
subPerks.description: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.

primaryPerks.name: Press the Attack
primaryPerks.description: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.

primaryPerks.name: Lethal Tempo
primaryPerks.description:
1.5s after damaging a champion gain 40 - 110% Attack Speed (based on level) for 3s. Attacking a champion extends the effect to 6s.

Cooldown: 6s

Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: 1.5s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of Attack Speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

primaryPerks.name: Fleet Footwork
primaryPerks.description:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.3 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

primaryPerks.name: Conqueror
primaryPerks.description:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.

primaryPerks.description:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.

primaryPerks.name: Summon Aery
primaryPerks.description:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.

primaryPerks.name: Arcane Comet
primaryPerks.description:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.

primaryPerks.name: Phase Rush
primaryPerks.description:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.

primaryPerks.name: Nullifying Orb
primaryPerks.description:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.

primaryPerks.name: Manaflow Band
primaryPerks.description:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds
primaryPerks.shortDescription:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

primaryPerks.name: Nimbus Cloak
primaryPerks.description:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 35% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).
primaryPerks.shortDescription: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.

primaryPerks.name: Transcendence
primaryPerks.description:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
primaryPerks.shortDescription:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

primaryPerks.name: Celerity
primaryPerks.description: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

primaryPerks.name: Absolute Focus
primaryPerks.description:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

primaryPerks.name: Scorch
primaryPerks.description:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 15 - 35 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.

primaryPerks.name: Waterwalking
primaryPerks.description:
Gain 25 Move Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.

primaryPerks.name: Gathering Storm
primaryPerks.description:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.

subPerks.name: Cheap Shot
subPerks.description:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

subPerks.name: Taste of Blood
subPerks.description:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 18-35 (+0.2 bonus AD, +0.1 AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: 20s
subPerks.shortDescription: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

subPerks.name: Sudden Impact
subPerks.description:
After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 7 Lethality and 6 Magic Penetration for 5s.

Cooldown: 4s
subPerks.shortDescription: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.

subPerks.name: Zombie Ward
subPerks.description:
Takedowns on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Zombie Ward spawned, up to 10.

After spawning 10 Zombie Wards, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 120s and do not count towards your ward limit.
subPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.

subPerks.name: Ghost Poro
subPerks.description:
When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro, which grants vision for 60s. Nearby enemy champions scare the Ghost Poro away.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Ghost Poro spawned and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion up to 10 stacks.

After gaining 10 stacks, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.
subPerks.shortDescription: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.

subPerks.name: Eyeball Collection
subPerks.description:
Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at 10 eyeballs, additionally gain an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.

Collect 1 eyeball per champion takedown.
subPerks.shortDescription: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.

subPerks.name: Ravenous Hunter
subPerks.description:
Omnivamp: 1% + 1.7% per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.
subPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Omnivamp.

subPerks.name: Ingenious Hunter
subPerks.description:
Gain 10 Item Haste plus an additional 5 Item Haste per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Item Haste affects all items with cooldowns.
subPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Item Haste (includes Trinkets).

subPerks.name: Relentless Hunter
subPerks.description:
Gain 5 Move Speed out of combat plus 8 per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
subPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.

subPerks.name: Ultimate Hunter
subPerks.description:
Your ultimate gains 6 Ability Haste, plus an additional 5 Ability Haste per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
subPerks.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.

subPerks.name: Overheal
subPerks.description:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.
subPerks.shortDescription: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.

subPerks.name: Triumph
subPerks.description:
Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner
subPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.

subPerks.name: Presence of Mind
subPerks.description:
Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.
subPerks.shortDescription: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.

subPerks.name: Legend: Alacrity
subPerks.description:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.

subPerks.name: Legend: Tenacity
subPerks.description:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 2.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.

subPerks.name: Legend: Bloodline
subPerks.description:
Gain 0.6% lifesteal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.

subPerks.name: Coup de Grace
subPerks.description: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

subPerks.name: Cut Down
subPerks.description:
Deal 5% to 15% more damage to champions, based on how much more max health they have than you.

Bonus damage scales up linearly against enemies with 10% to 100% more max health than you.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.

subPerks.name: Last Stand
subPerks.description: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.

primaryPerks.name: Arcane Comet
primaryPerks.description:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.

primaryPerks.name: Phase Rush
primaryPerks.description:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.

primaryPerks.name: Nullifying Orb
primaryPerks.description:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.

primaryPerks.name: Manaflow Band
primaryPerks.description:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds
primaryPerks.shortDescription:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

primaryPerks.name: Nimbus Cloak
primaryPerks.description:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 35% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).
primaryPerks.shortDescription: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.

primaryPerks.name: Transcendence
primaryPerks.description:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
primaryPerks.shortDescription:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

primaryPerks.name: Celerity
primaryPerks.description: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

primaryPerks.name: Absolute Focus
primaryPerks.description:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

primaryPerks.name: Scorch
primaryPerks.description:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 15 - 35 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.

primaryPerks.name: Waterwalking
primaryPerks.description:
Gain 25 Move Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.

primaryPerks.name: Gathering Storm
primaryPerks.description:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...
primaryPerks.shortDescription: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.

subPerks.name: Overheal
subPerks.description:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.
subPerks.shortDescription: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.

subPerks.name: Triumph
subPerks.description:
Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner
subPerks.shortDescription: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.

subPerks.name: Presence of Mind
subPerks.description:
Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.
subPerks.shortDescription: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.

subPerks.name: Legend: Alacrity
subPerks.description:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.

subPerks.name: Legend: Tenacity
subPerks.description:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 2.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.

subPerks.name: Legend: Bloodline
subPerks.description:
Gain 0.6% lifesteal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
subPerks.shortDescription: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.

subPerks.name: Coup de Grace
subPerks.description: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

subPerks.name: Cut Down
subPerks.description:
Deal 5% to 15% more damage to champions, based on how much more max health they have than you.

Bonus damage scales up linearly against enemies with 10% to 100% more max health than you.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.

subPerks.name: Last Stand
subPerks.description: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.
subPerks.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
